oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.socialnetwork.model.datacontrol
Class SocialNetworkDataControl

java.lang.Object
  oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.socialnetwork.model.datacontrol.SocialNetworkDataControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SocialNetworkDataControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

The data control that is used to read the definition of the social network configuration and provide it back for consumption in the UI.

Since:
11.1.1.7.0
Version:
$Header: atgpf/applcore/applications/SocialNetwork/Model/src/oracle/apps/fnd/applcore/socialnetwork/model/datacontrol/SocialNetworkDataControl.java /st_atgpf_11.1.1.7.2/6 2013/08/29 16:34:46 pacross Exp $

Constructor Detail

SocialNetworkDataControl

public SocialNetworkDataControl()
Default constructor.

SocialNetworkDataControl

public SocialNetworkDataControl(FndOsnIntegrationFactory factory)
Test constructor - Do not use this outside of unit tests. The factory that is passed in will not be serialized if the data control is serialized and will reset back to the default.

Method Detail

getSocialNetworkConfiguration

public java.util.List<SocialNetworkNode> getSocialNetworkConfiguration()
The social network configuration tree structure. Note: loadSocialNetworkConfiguration must be called before calling this method otherwise null will be returned.

Returns:
social network configuration tree.

loadSocialNetworkConfiguration

public void loadSocialNetworkConfiguration(java.lang.String moduleType,
                                           java.lang.String moduleKey)
Load the configuration from the all OSN integration xml files that exist in the class path.

Parameters:
moduleType - the module type to filter the results by.
moduleKey - the key within the type to results by.

selected node.

tree of attributes.

getCurrentNodeAllAttributesEnabled

public boolean getCurrentNodeAllAttributesEnabled()
Determines if all the attributes for the attribute tree are enabled. The test for enablement is changedCustomerEnabled on the node.

Returns:
true if all attributes are enabled.

setCurrentNodeAllAttributesEnabled

public void setCurrentNodeAllAttributesEnabled(boolean allEnabled)
Determines if all the attributes for the attribute tree are enabled. The test for enablement is changedCustomerEnabled on the node.

Parameters:
allEnabled - set to true if all attributes are to be enabled.

applyCurrentNodeAttributeChanges

public void applyCurrentNodeAttributeChanges()
Makes any changes to the enabled state of the attributes be retained within the attribute.

rollbackCurrentNodeAttributeChanges

public void rollbackCurrentNodeAttributeChanges()
Remove any changes to the enabled state of the attributes thus restoring it back to its original state.

getCurrentNodeOsnAttributes

public java.util.List<SocialNetworkNodeAttribute> getCurrentNodeOsnAttributes()
Determines the list of Customer OSN enabled attributes for the currently selected node.

Returns:
list of OSN enabled attributes.

currentNodeAttributeDetails

public java.util.List<SocialNetworkEnabledItem> currentNodeAttributeDetails(java.lang.String attributeName)
From the currently selected node get the attribute with the name supplied and provide the list of attribute details for it. If there is no selected node, the attribute name doesn't exist in the node or there are no attribute details then a empty list will be provided.

Returns:
list of attribute details.

getEnabledItems

public java.util.List<SocialNetworkEnabledItem> getEnabledItems()
Provide a translated list of the Customer Enabled list items.

Returns:
the list of translated values.

saveConfigurationToMdsOsn

public void saveConfigurationToMdsOsn()
Perform a save of the structure changes made to the VO definitions to MDS and synchronize the data with Oracle Social Network.

saveAllConfigurationToMdsOsn

public void saveAllConfigurationToMdsOsn()
Perform a save of all view object structure definitions to MDS and synchronize the data with Oracle Social Network.

enableAllDisabledBusinessObjectsToManual

public void enableAllDisabledBusinessObjectsToManual()
For each business object in the model, if it has a customer enabled value not set or equal to disabled (No) then set the value to be Manual.

synchronizeVOStructureWithOSN

public void synchronizeVOStructureWithOSN(java.lang.String voName)
Synchronize the passed vo to OSN.

Parameters:
voName - full name of the VO to be loaded. This VO must be available on the classpath of the caller.
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - if voName is null or empty String.
oracle.jbo.JboException - if there are any problems connecting or sending to Osn.

sendCurrentNodeTranslationsToOsn

public void sendCurrentNodeTranslationsToOsn()
Perform a send of the translated VO data to Oracle Social Network for the currently selected View Object.

sendTranslationsToOsn

public void sendTranslationsToOsn()
Perform a send of the translated VO data to Oracle Social Network.

synchronizeCurrentNodeVOStructureWithOSN

public void synchronizeCurrentNodeVOStructureWithOSN()
Synchronize the currently selected View Object to OSN.

synchronizeUnmodifiedVOStructuresWithOSN

public void synchronizeUnmodifiedVOStructuresWithOSN()
Synchronize the all of the unmodified OSN enabled View Objects to OSN.

saveSynchronizeVOStructuresWithOSN

public void saveSynchronizeVOStructuresWithOSN()
Synchronize the all of the unmodified OSN enabled View Objects to OSN and save any of the modified ones.

isCurrentNodeModified

public boolean isCurrentNodeModified()
Determine if the currently selected node has been modified.

Returns:
true if the current node structure has been modified.

isAnyNodeModified

public boolean isAnyNodeModified(boolean checkOnlyOsnEnabled)
Test to see if any of the View Objects have been modified.

Parameters:
checkOnlyOsnEnabled - if true only check ones that have a enabled flag of manual or automatic. if false then check all view objects.
Returns:
true if any of the matching view objects are modified.

setSendListener

public void setSendListener(SocialNetworkSendEventListener sendListener)
Set the send listener which can be used to listen on the send process.

Parameters:
sendListener - the send listener.

initializeOsnConnectionManager

public void initializeOsnConnectionManager()
Call this method in a multi-threaded environment to initialize the OSN Connection Manager before performing any sends on a thread. This method does not need to be called when using OSN in a single thread as they as they will automatically be initialized during the send process.
